Package de.jhh4.tiles

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
de.jhh4.tiles.Tile
Direct Known Subclasses:
Forest, Mountain, Ocean, Plains
public abstract class Tile extends Object
takes care of logic for tiles/the game object description: a forest is green, produces wood, and is accessible abstraction: a tile object has a terrain type a colour, a ressource, an accessible boolean a return method for ressource
